questionTitle: My father is going to have his motor ........... tomorrow.
She is .............. her friends.
I often help my brother ............. his homework.
My mother needs a pairs of .......................... shoes.
They were ................... to the radio at 8 o'clock yesterday.
Most of the students are ................ to pass the examination.
I .............. this book from the general library.
The nurse looks ................... patients in hospital.
He is collecting stamps and he has a valuable .............. of stamps.
Among the subjects, he likes literature best and he's also excellent ................. math.
My friends are waiting ................... me.
His car crashed ...................... my motorcycle.
Mary will have to get the brakes .............
Who are you going ...................?
My sister has been saving for two years. She ....................... $2,000.
Could you tell me how much ................... a month?
What this sentence ................ (mean)?
My brother asked me if I ..................
Her best painting ..................... in the gallery.
